faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Konfetti

q1.question: How do I join an event?
q1.answer: You can join an event using either the invite link shared by the host, or by entering the event code manually in the Join Event page.

q2.question: Is my profile public?
q2.answer: No, your profile is only visible to other attendees of events you've joined. Once an event ends (3 days after the event date), your profile becomes invisible to those attendees.

q3.question: What happens after the event ends?
q3.answer: Matchmaking closes 3 days after the event date. After that, you can no longer swipe or match with new people from that event, but existing matches and chats remain accessible.

q4.question: Can I join multiple events?
q4.answer: Yes! You can join as many events as you're invited to. Your profile will be visible separately in each event.

q5.question: How much does it cost?
q5.answer: Pricing varies based on the number of guests you expect at your event. Send us a message at hello@konfetti.app or via WhatsApp and we'll provide you with a personalized quote!

q6.question: How does matchmaking timing work?
q6.answer: Matchmaking opens 1 week before the event date and closes 3 days after. This gives guests time to connect before and after the celebration.

q7.question: Can I edit my profile after joining?
q7.answer: Yes, you can edit your profile, photos, bio, interests, and prompts at any time from the Profile page.

q8.question: Is Konfetti available in my language?
q8.answer: Konfetti is currently available in English and Spanish. You can switch languages in the app settings.
